messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Tired of all this mother fuckin' racism in our mother fuckin' station, Please don't be racist. -Giggles the Clown Captain

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Kill all traitors, Friendly or not, Being an enemy of the corporation is a CAPITAL crime, You must murder them shitties.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Jerry isss a fuck head who needsss to die. If you sssee him, beat hisss ssstupid dumb fucking face in.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod One.
